attributes.action: Make pepper spray legal for self-defence in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Main argument of "enemies" of pepper spray legalisation is that it will open the door for potential criminals; however, any potential criminals would use any sort of weapons (e.g. knives, sprays) for their malicious actions even without legalisation — because such weapons can be bought in the UK without any barriers (and even an umbrella can be used as an offensive weapon - let's just ban it).
attributes.background:
People in the UK do not have a legal way to defend themselves effectively against armed criminals or simply against those who have a physical advantage.

In current situation - potential rapists, terrorists, thieves and robbers have an advantage against law abiding people.
